attributes.action: scrap plans to introduce fortnightly refuse collections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already pay excessive amounts of council tax, but with fortnightly refuse collections we would get even less of a service. Fortnightly refuse collections would also lead to an increase in vermin and fly tipping.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
